short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hit The Moving Targets With Bullets!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hit The Target game in a popup! Click or press the spacebar to launch a projectile into the air! Hitting targets give you points, and missing them decrease your health. A, D, ArrowLeft or ArrowRight make you move. The movement is easy to use! Can you beat the epic shooting target training? Download this extension to find out! This is in a popup not disturbing any thing you're doing on your current tab!
